title: ‘Indescribable’: Somalis Recount Horror of Blasts That Killed at Least 100
description: Twin explosions were the deadliest terrorist attack in the country in five years and underscored the growing threat posed by the terrorist group Al Shabab.
dc:creator: Hussein Mohamed and Abdi Latif Dahir
media:credit: Hassan Ali Elmi/Agence France-Presse — Getty Images
media:description: Destroyed buildings in Mogadishu, Somalia, on Sunday, a day after two explosions targeted the Ministry of Education.
